    • Method Detail

      • numberEndIndex

        public static int numberEndIndex​(java.lang.String cmd,
                                 int pstart)
        Finds the index of the first character in a string that is not part of a valid Gerber number
        Parameters:
        cmd - - the string to search
        pstart - - the index of the character where the search is to begin
        Returns:
        the index of the first non-numeric character or -1 if pstart is beyond the end of the string or the character at pstart is not part of a valid gerber number

      • computeArcParameters

        public static Utils.ArcParameters computeArcParameters​(gerberFileReader.GraphicsState graphicsState,
                                                       gerberFileReader.Point endPoint)
                                                throws GerberLayerFormatException
        Computes Java AWT Geometry arc parameters
        Parameters:
        graphicsState - - the current GraphicsState (starting point, relative center, and direction of the arc)
        endPoint - - the end point of the arc
        Returns:
        the arc parameters
        Throws:
        GerberLayerFormatException - if the arc starting or center points are not set or if the plot state is linear

      • reversePath

        public static java.awt.geom.Path2D reversePath​(java.awt.geom.Path2D path)
        Reverses the specified path so that its iterator traverses the path in the opposite direction
        Parameters:
        path - - the path to reverse
        Returns:
        the reversed path
